title: onebadpug
author: onebadpug
content: Hello,I am looking for resources to learn bitcoin mining. Preferably some place in Texas where I can go in person and learn how it all works. Are there any sort of regular workshops, coaches, or btc mining consultants that anyone can recommend? Additionally if there are any online resources like YouTubers or blogs that are helpful, I would be grateful to see a list.Thanks very much!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: All you need is already on the sticky thread under this section if you didn't read it yet you can check this link below- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4636521.0Actually, mining Bitcoin is easy the machines you need are plug and play you just need to set up the pool and it's ready to mine. But if you want to follow someone on youtube then follow Voskcoin and watch one of his videos below related to your needs.- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8XNQ4lP7PIc

comments.author: MinerMEDIC
comments.created_time: July 04, 2022, 03:59:44 AMLast edit: July 04, 2022, 04:49:43 PM by MinerMEDIC
comments.body: I’m a Bitmain affiliated trainer and we have a guy in Austin. I was the assistant trainer when he came through our Chicago office a few months ago. He’s pretty sharp and we’re continuing to keep him on as a consultant while he operates from home. I know Texas is a big place, let me know if that’s helpful.J
